title: Moses 1:1-22  I Am a Son of God (6:38) Elder Jeffrey R. Holland
short_title: Moses 1:1-22  I Am a Son of God (6:38) Elder Jeffrey R. Holland
content: Moses 1:1-22  I Am a Son of God (6:38) Elder Jeffrey R. Holland

Elder Jeffrey R. Holland recounts the story of Moses and his encounter with the Lord on the mountain. Shortly after his vision, Moses is tempted by Satan. Read Elder Holland's full article, "Cast Not Away Therefore Your Confidence"
